name: Hexagons
description:
"Hexagons" is a fast paced PvP shooter. The game has a variety of weapons and MOBA, Capture The Flag, DeathMatch and other game modes, more unique lift platform system. Easy pick up and play, no complicated setups or rules: it’s kill or be killed!Maps and Modes
  • Hexagons covers a wide variety of locations in its many maps. Some are large and some are small, but all of them have personality and something that makes it unique and different Gameplay:
  • MOBA Mode (Unskilled pure shooting MOBA mode)
  • DeathMatch
  • Capture The Flag
  • King Of The Summit
  • Others
Game Features
  • Unique lift platform system that allows you to have more time to kill at altitude.
  • A variety of weapons in the game, there are left and right two shooting modes. There are always new ways to kill enemies in Hexagons.
  • All characters and weapons have dropable skin, allowing players to use different skins and accessories.
  • With multiple game characters, each game character has a unique talent.
